title: One Minute French - Special Announcement
description: We're very pleased to announce that the premium version of One Minute French is now available. Learners can download the pdf lesson guide featuring all the words and phrases included in the course, enhanced podcasts which provide synchronised flashcards which can be viewed on iPods and iTunes while listening, a 'quick quiz' podcast which lets learners test their knowledge against the clock, and the "Take-off Time" podcast - a handy review of all the language covered in the series ready to copy to your iPod as you board your flight. Full information is provided in the podcast including a discount code valid until January 23 2009.
